name: Desert Runner (timothek2112, BigPigMoon, pepega-123)
description:
We are a small team of the "Develop group", which gathered to develop this little game "Desert Runner" about a robot that needs to cross the desert, completing quests and mining new components to protect against enemies.

Drag the blocks with the left mouse button to the robot to attach them.

To build a building, right-click when its drawing is displayed.

You can mine resources by installing drills in places sprinkled with crystals.

The goal of the game is to complete the quest at all service stations in the desert.
